{"id":684485830,"question_id":695,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 years, 1 month","timestamp":1650506356,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/684485830/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"42.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxAreaOfIsland(int[][] grid) {\n        // int [][] visited = new int[grid.length()][grid[0].length()];\n        \n        int max = 0;\n        for(int y=0; y<grid.length;y++){\n            for(int x=0; x<grid[0].length; x++){\n                \n                if(grid[y][x]==1){\n                    \n                    int area = fill(x, y, grid, 0);\n                    if(area>max)\n                        max = area;\n                }\n                    \n                \n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        return max;\n    }\n    \n    private int fill(int x, int y, int[][] grid, int area){\n        \n        if(x<0 || x>=grid[0].length || y<0 || y>=grid.length || grid[y][x] != 1)\n            return area;\n        \n        grid[y][x] = 2;\n        area++;\n        \n        int right = fill(x+1, y, grid, 0);\n        int left =fill(x-1, y, grid, 0);\n        int up =fill(x, y+1, grid, 0);\n        int down =fill(x, y-1, grid, 0);\n        \n        return area + right + left + up + down;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
